title: How to Make Slow Cooker Cranberry Pork Roast

steps.headline: Season the pork roast with salt and pepper on both sides.
steps.description: Add it to a slow cooker.

steps.headline: Make the sauce.
steps.description: Mix the rest of the ingredients in a medium bowl. Pour the mixture on top of the pork roast.

steps.headline: Cook the mixture.
steps.description: Set the slow cooker on to a low setting for 8-10 hours.

steps.headline: Serve while the slow cooker is on a warm setting.
steps.description: This enables the dish to continue warming.

text: Season the pork roast with salt and pepper on both sides. Add it to a slow cooker. Make the sauce. Mix the rest of the ingredients in a medium bowl. Pour the mixture on top of the pork roast. Cook the mixture. Set the slow cooker on to a low setting for 8-10 hours. Serve while the slow cooker is on a warm setting. This enables the dish to continue warming. Finished.
